div.p: Brandywine Heights Area School District building project information including project updates, bid documents and ACT 34 hearing information can be found using the link below.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: The safety of our students, staff, and community is paramount. We support the decision of Governor Tom Wolf to close schools until further notice. Of course, this does create a challenge – to provide quality education online to students. Thankfully, our BHASD community is up to that challenge! To learn more about the steps BHASD is taking during these unique times, please CLICK HERE.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.h2: Elementary School Addition Plan – Community Presentation
div.p: In an effort to encourage social distancing as we all work together to combat COVID-19, please know the community presentation regarding the Elementary School construction project scheduled for March 17 has been canceled. Please click on the following link to view a recorded version of the presentation.
This decision is in alignment with the direction provided by Governor Tom Wolf. Thank you for your understanding.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey
vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: Register your child for Kindergarten. Your child is eligible for kindergarten if they turn five (5) by September 1, 2020.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: Brandywine Heights is proud to once again offer Camp Invention. Camp Invention is a STEM summer program that turns curious students into innovative thinkers. CLICK HERE to find out more and to REGISTER NOW!

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: The Brandywine Heights Area School District is a participant in the Amazon Services LLC Associates Program, an affiliate advertising program designed to provide a means for sites to earn advertising fees by advertising and linking to amazon.com.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: For up-to-date information regarding the Brandywine Heights Community Task Force, please visit their new web page! www.bhctaskforce.org

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey
